full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title

*Liquefied Dry Ice Supply and Delivery for Canadian Health Measures Survey*

## Contract Details

* **Reference Number**: WS3626188267-Doc3773267655
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3626188267
* **Publication Date**: 2022-12-01
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-12-16, 2:00 PM EST
* **Amendment Date**: 2022-12-08
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-01-10
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-12-31
* **Contract Status**: Expired

## Tender Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of Statistics Canada has released a Request for Proposal for the supply and delivery of dry ice for the Canadian Health Measures Survey. The contract involves the supply of 156kg of dry ice on a weekly basis for five weeks, with the option to extend by one additional week, to the 14 mobile clinic locations across Canada operating during that time, as well as the delivery of 12kg of dry ice on a monthly basis to the head office in Ottawa.

## Bidding Requirements

* Deadline for submission: 2022-12-16, 2:00 PM EST
* Bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive
* Documents may be submitted in either English or French
* A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders who previously submitted proposals

## Note for Bidders

Please do not disregard the previous bid solicitation number - Doc3626347453 dated October 13, 2022, with a closing of November 23, 2022 at 14:00 EST, as it is canceled and superseded by this current bid solicitation.

## Additional Information

* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Delivery Regions: Quebec (excluding National Capital Region), Alberta, Nova Scotia, British Columbia, Saskatchewan, New Brunswick, and Ontario (excluding National Capital Region)

## Contact Information

For further information or clarification, please contact Shen Tao, PSPC/SPAC, at tao.shen@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
